means: <美>（用作饮料或制醋用的）苹果汁

sentence.Network_en: Any faults in the original cider stood out sharply after distillation.
sentence.Network_cn: 原先苹果酒里的任何杂质在蒸馏后都会凸现出来。

sentence.Network_en: Nutmeg, parsley and cider all complement the flavour of these beans well.
sentence.Network_cn: 肉豆蔻、西芹和苹果酒都能很好地突出这些豆子的味道。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 葡萄酒英语_百度文库 ... Wine Cooler： 清爽酒 Cider： 苹果酒 Brandy： 白兰地.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... chortle v．n. 开心地笑 cider n. 苹果酒，苹果汁 cinder n. 余烬，矿渣.
不出产葡萄的诺曼底生产用发酵的苹果西打(Cider)蒸馏做出味道最不怎样的卡瓦多酒。半杯咖啡加卡瓦多酒。
食物英语单词_百度文库 ... 白兰地 Brandy 34. 苹果酒 cider 35. 威士忌 whisky 36.

苹果醋（Cider vinegar）为西厨常用的食醋调料。以苹果汁为原料接入醋种液酿造而成。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French sidre, via ecclesiastical Latin from ecclesiastical Greek sikera, from Hebrew šēḵār 'strong drink'

entry.tran: 苹果酒(英国的苹果酒通常含有酒精;美国的苹果酒通常不含酒精，含有酒精的苹果酒通常叫做 hard cider)
entry.def: Cider is a drink made from apples which in Britain usually contains alcohol. In the United States, cider does not usually contain alcohol, and if it does contain alcohol, it is usually called hard cider .

means.word_mean: 1. a beverage made from juice pressed from apples
